channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Call for the B2 First (FCE) exam on 22 + 23 February 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B2 First (FCE) exam scheduled on 22 + 23 February 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Call for the C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam on 28 February 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English C2 Proficiency (CPE) exam scheduled on 28 February 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Special English Test session¬†dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Winter Session
item.description: %0A %0AThe SLAM Centre is running a special English test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the autumn session. The test is being held in person at the SLAM Centre, 11, Santa Sofia street ‚Äì Milan - on the following day:%0A‚Ä¢ 22nd January 2024 at 9.30 a.m.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: University closed
item.description: The University will be closed from 23 to 26 December and from 30 December to 1 January 2024 for the Christmas holidays.%0A

item.title: Closure of Student desks
item.description: Student desks will be closed until Tuesday, 9 January 2024. Online and in-person services will be suspended.%0AFor information or requests, you can use the InformaStudenti service.%0A %0A

item.title: Call for the B1 Preliminary (PET) exam on 21 + 22 February 2024
item.description: The call is open to register for the digital Cambridge English B1 Preliminary (PET) exam scheduled on 21 + 22 February 2024.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: Interdepartmental Academic Office for the Faculty of Law: working hours during the Christmas holidays
item.description: On Friday, 22 December and Friday, 29 December 2023, the Interdepartmental Academic Office for undergraduate programmes Law and Sciences of Legal Services will be available remotely via Microsoft Teams (email: alice.fazio@unimi.it; tel. 02 503 12473), from 9.30 am to 12 noon. On Friday, 5 January 2024, the office will be closed.%0A

item.title: Office closure - Faculty Student Offices Sector
item.description: The Student Offices (Se.Fa) of the Faculty of Political, Economic and Social Sciences will be closed from 27 to 29 December 2023.%0A

item.title: Suspension of services during Christmas Holidays 2023/2024
item.description: The office will be available until Friday, 22 December 2023. Services will resume on Monday, 8 January 2023.%0APhone and e-mail support services will be suspended during this period.%0A

item.title: Closure of Humanities Se.Fa Offices
item.description: Se.Fa Offices at the Faculty of Humanities will be closed from 27 to 29 December 2023.%0A

item.title: University Scholarships final rankings academic year 2023/24
item.description: The final rankings of the University Scholarships a.y. 2023/24 for students enrolled into successive years, in the first year of a Bachelor and the first year of a single-cycle master degree programme have been published.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: International Welcome Desk
item.description: As part of our commitment to supporting our international student community, we are pleased to introduce our new dedicated service, the International Welcome Desk that will support international students in presence and through MS Teams.%0AAll available information at the page International Students Office - Welcome Desk.%0A
